properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 3:05PM PST until January 21 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
10 to 13 feet at 18 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Monday to 3 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MONDAY TO 3 AM PST TUESDAY
